data.title: Choose Life, Christian Tv Program, Deuteronomy 30
data.meta_description: Join Deborah G Ross each week on Choose Life TV - Empowering YOU to LIVE in the BLESSING! Deuteronomy 30:19 says the blessing or the curse is up to you...God sa
data.text:
Empowering YOU to LIVE in the BLESSING!

CHOOSE LIFE TV programs reach into homes - bringing the Good News of the gospel to those who surf the airwaves looking for hope. Many who have never been to church, perhaps drug and alcohol addicted, lonely, depressed, marriage problems, identity problems, anger problems and the list goes on, will tune in and listen to our message. CHOOSE LIFE with Deborah Ross addresses all of these issues by teaching people how to live according to God's Word. CHOOSE LIFE TV PROGRAMS are making our communities happier, stronger and safer - one life at a time.

Your support and contributions will enable us to pay for studio production and air time. Your generous donations impact the lives of those around you.

Thank you!
